text: Mirosław Andrzej Waligóra (born 4 February 1970 in Kraków) is a former Polish footballer. ==Career== ===National team=== He represented his native country at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona. There he won the silver medal with the national squad. ==References== ==External links== * Profile on Polish Olympic Committee * Profile at 90minut.pl Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Hutnik Nowa Huta players Category:Olympic footballers of Poland Category:Footballers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Poland Category:Sportspeople from Kraków Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Olympic medalists in football Category:K.F.C. title: Mirosław Waligóra
